info.title: OpenAPI Datatruck
info.description: To be able to use Datatruck OpenAPI you should create tokens from your dashboard. Go to your dashboard and create token with appropriate scopes and expiration. Expiration and scopes are optional as well as description for your token, but remember name is required.

get.description: The Datatruck API returns JSON-encoded responses (It is list of loads):

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

post.description: This endpoint allows users to create a new load in the Datatruck Transportation Management System (TMS).

get.description: Fetch details of a specific order by its ID.

parameters.name: pk
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the order

get.description: Retrieve a list of work orders with related tasks, payments, and tags.

200.description: List of work orders retrieved successfully

post.description: Creates a new work order with associated tasks, compensation details, and notes.

get.description: Retrieve a list of work orders with related tasks, payments, and tags.

200.description: List of dispatcher board retrieved successfully

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of drivers, including their truck, trailer, dispatcher details, and other attributes such as contact information, status, and driver type.

200.description: Successful response with a paginated list of drivers.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of trailers, including their driver operators, trailer types, dispatch statuses, and other attributes such as unit number, VIN, make, model, and year.

200.description: Successful response with a paginated list of trailers.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of trucks, including their unit number, plate number, VIN, make, model, year, status, and state.

200.description: Successful response with a paginated list of trucks.

post.description: Creates a new driver with the provided details, including name, contact information, driver type, employee status, and optional license and dispatch information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created driver.

post.description: Creates a new trailer with the provided details, including make, model, year, unit number, VIN, and optional fields such as plate number, state, status, and driver assignments.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created trailer.

post.description: Creates a new truck with the provided details, including make, model, year, plate number, unit number, VIN, state, ownership, and optional fields such as status, driver assignments, and warranty information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created truck.

mc_number.description: Motor Carrier number for the shipment

weight.description: Weight of the goods being transported

rate_confirmation.description: Rate confirmation document in base64 format or use global url of the file)

stops.description: List of stops along the route

company_name.description: Name of the company at the stop location

zip_code.description: ZIP code of the stop location

enter_time.description: Time when the truck enters the stop location

exit_time.description: Time when the truck exits the stop location

seal_number.description: Seal number for the load at this stop

mc_number.description: Motor Carrier number for the shipment

load_pay.description: Total payment amount for the load

total_miles.description: Total miles covered for the load

special_instruction.description: Any special instructions for the load

tags.description: List of tags associated with the order

name.description: Tag name associated with the order

load_pay.description: Total payment amount for the load

total_miles.description: Total miles covered for the load

created_by__full_name.description: Full name of the order creator

total_other_pay.description: Additional payments related to the order

tags.description: List of tags associated with the order

next.description: URL to the next page of results

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results

status.description: Current status of the work order

vendor.description: Vendor assigned to the work order

assigned_to.description: Person responsible for the work order

truck.description: Truck associated with the work order

trailer.description: Trailer associated with the work order

approved_by.description: Person who approved the work order

total_price.description: Total price for the work order

scheduled_on_date.description: Scheduled date and time for the work order

notes.description: Additional notes related to the work order

work_order_tasks.description: List of tasks related to the work order

compensation.description: Compensation details for the work order

tags.description: Tags associated with the work order

dispatcher.description: Details of the dispatcher, if assigned.

drivers.description: List of drivers associated with the dispatcher.

total_driver_pay.description: Total driver pay for the dispatcher's orders.

total_gross.description: Total gross amount for the dispatcher's orders.

total_mile.description: Total miles covered by the dispatcher's orders.

total_rpm.description: Total revenue per mile for the dispatcher's orders.

total_trips.description: Total number of trips for the dispatcher's orders.

count.description: Total number of dispatcher board entries.

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results.

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results.

id.description: Unique identifier for the trailer type.
Unique identifier for the dispatch status.

color.description: Color associated with the dispatch status, if available.

plate_number.description: Plate number of the trailer, if available.

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the trailer.

state.description: State where the trailer is registered, if available.

driver_operator.description: Primary driver operator assigned to the trailer, if any.

co_driver_operator.description: Co-driver operator assigned to the trailer, if any.

type.description: Type of the trailer, if specified.

dispatch_status.description: Dispatch status of the trailer, if applicable.

next.description: URL to the next page of results.

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results.

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the truck.

state.description: State where the truck is registered.

next.description: URL to the next page of results.

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results.

status.description: Current status of the driver, if applicable.

is_main.description: Indicates if the driver is the main driver.

mc_number.description: Motor carrier number for the driver.

driver_license_issue_date.description: Issue date of the driver's license, if provided.

driver_license_state.description: State issuing the driver's license, if provided.

driver_license_expiration.description: Expiration date of the driver's license, if provided.

driver_license_class.description: Class of the driver's license, if provided.

email.description: Email address of the driver, if provided.

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the trailer.

plate_number.description: Plate number of the trailer, if available.

state.description: State where the trailer is registered, if available.

status.description: Current status of the trailer, if applicable.

ownership.description: Ownership details of the trailer, if provided.

company_mc.description: Company motor carrier number, if applicable.

notes.description: Additional notes about the trailer, if provided.

driver_operator.description: ID of the primary driver operator assigned to the trailer, if any.

co_driver_operator.description: ID of the co-driver operator assigned to the trailer, if any.

reg_expiry_date.description: Registration expiry date of the trailer, if provided.

last_annual_inspection_date.description: Date of the last annual inspection, if provided.

owner.description: ID of the owner of the trailer, if applicable.

vin.description: Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the truck.

state.description: State where the truck is registered.

status.description: Current status of the truck, if applicable.

company_mc.description: Company motor carrier number, if applicable.

notes.description: Additional notes about the truck, if provided.

driver_operator.description: ID of the primary driver operator assigned to the truck, if any.

co_driver_operator.description: ID of the co-driver operator assigned to the truck, if any.

reg_expiry_date.description: Registration expiry date of the truck, if provided.

last_annual_inspection_date.description: Date of the last annual inspection, if provided.

odometer.description: Current odometer reading of the truck.

color.description: Color of the truck, if provided.

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the truck, if provided.

integration_eld.description: Electronic Logging Device (ELD) integration details, if provided.

integration_id.description: Integration ID for the truck, if provided.

integration_api.description: Integration API details for the truck, if provided.

owner.description: ID of the owner of the truck, if applicable.

vendor.description: Vendor of the truck, if provided.

seller.description: Seller of the truck, if provided.

ownership_pickup_odometer.description: Odometer reading at the time of ownership pickup.

ownership_pickup_date.description: Date of ownership pickup, if provided.

primary_warranty.description: Primary warranty expiry date, if provided.

secondary_warranty.description: Secondary warranty expiry date, if provided.
